text: (Not For) All the Tea in China may refer to: ==Books== *All the Tea in China, novel by Kyril Bonfiglioli *For All the Tea in China, novel by Sarah Rose 2009 ==Film and TV== *"All the Tea in China", TV episode Lucky Feller 1976 *"For All the Tea in China", TV episode of Touched by an Angel 2002 ==Music== ===Songs=== *"All The Tea in China", song by Susan Jacks 1980 *"All the Tea in China", song by Hugh Cornwell from Wolf 1988 *"For All the Tea in China", song by Sharon O'Neill
title: All the Tea in China
